i haven t gone home in over two years.

I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings.
i like to watch japanese cartoons anime in my free time.

content.text: Hello! What do you do for fun?
I love growing sunflowers! I am going to miss the sun and the beach, but I am ready to focus on my studies.
I love relaxing in the low tide and thinking about my family. I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings. I like to watch Japanese cartoons (anime) in my free time.

I once spent a week in a cabin in the mountains in the middle of winter and loved every minute of it. I enjoy spending time with my German Shepherd, as he helps me to relax and forget about my inner critic.
I am glad that you had a great time in the mountains. I have a german shepherd as well, his name is Max. He is the best dog that I know.
That is a great name for a German Shepherd! I am sure that he is very happy to have you as his owner.
Thank you! I am glad that I have him.
What are your favorite shows to watch?
I really enjoy watching anime. My favorite show is Naruto.
I have heard of Naruto, but I have never seen it. What is it about?
It is about a young ninja who is trying to become the Hokage, which is the leader of all the ninjas in his village.
That sounds like an interesting show. I will have to check it out sometime.
You should! It is really good.
